author: Special Correspondent
text:
An engineering student allegedly committed suicide in a hostel room of an engineering college at Pulivalam near Thuraiyur on Saturday.

Sources said S. Selvakumar (21) of Vannankudikadu, a final year student of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, OAS College of Technology and Management, was found hanging in his room.

He was sharing the room with Shanmugavel (22) of Velampoondu near Dharapuram.

However, it was said that Shanmugavel did not stay in the room on Friday night due to difference of opinion with Selvakumar over a mobile phone that went missing.

The incident came to light when Shanmugavel, who stayed in his friend’s room, went to his room to have a bath.

Selvakumar body had been sent to the Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Government Hospital for post-mortem.

On information, the parents and relatives of Selvakumar rushed to the hospital. However, they refused to receive his body suspecting foul play in his death.
title: Engineering student commits suicide
